package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: GnuPG components error library (libgpg-error)
package-manager.description: This is a library that defines common error values for all GnuPG components. Among these are GPG, GPGSM, GPGME, GPG-Agent, libgcrypt, Libksba, DirMngr, Pinentry, SmartCard Daemon and possibly more in the future.
